Blue Jay matmen
Beat Haverford, 40-6
By ROBERT ROSENWASSER
The Blue Jay matmen earned
their fifth victory in seven starts
by crushing Haverford College
Saturday, 40-6.
Hopkins took nine out of ten
matches, the lone loss coming
when 150 pound grappler Ira
Papel was pinned. The offensive
totals show the Blue Jays
capturing five bouts by decisions
outscoring Haverford 57 points
to 16.
"Everybody wrestled great and
took advantage of every scoring
opportunity," commented Coach
Harry Gotwals. Coach Gotwals
pointed out the fact that
Haverford didn't possess the
most potent offense but quickly
added that his team didn't reduce
their level of wrestling ability to
match that of weaker Haverford.
